title: Relationships
description: A list of relationships between this entity (subject) and various other entities (objects)

description.title: Description
description.description: A short description of the relationship (e.g. 'is a', 'has a', 'knows', 'trusts', etc.)

qualifier.title: Qualifier
qualifier.description: A qualifier for the relationship (e.g. 'is a' could be qualified with 'former member', 'current member', etc.)

object_url.title: Object URL
object_url.description: The URL (starting with http:// or https://) that links to the receiving entity of the described relationship

metadata.purpose: URLs can be used to link the named entity to its presence on the web. In the case of an item or service, URLs can provide further information.
